message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose an offer of $18,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its market value but also the unique opportunities it presents for you. I believe this is a fair and competitive offer, and I look forward to your response.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, $18,000 is unfortunately a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $15,000, which is the maximum I can afford at this time. If you're open to discussing this further, I'm happy to hear your thoughts.
